title: Arcane Templates Registry Schema
description: Schema for Docker Compose template registry configuration

$schema.description: Optional JSON Schema meta reference in the registry file.

name.description: The name of the template registry.

description.description: A brief description of the template registry and its purpose.

version.description: The version of the registry using semantic versioning.

author.description: The author or organization maintaining the registry.

url.description: The URL to the registry repository or homepage.

templates.description: An array of Docker Compose templates available in the registry.

id.description: A unique identifier for the template. Must be lowercase with hyphens only.

name.description: The human-readable name of the template.

description.description: A detailed description of what the template provides and its use case.

version.description: The version of the template using semantic versioning.

author.description: The author or organization that created the template.

compose_url.description: The direct URL to the docker-compose.yml file for this template.

env_url.description: The direct URL to the environment variables example file (.env.example).

documentation_url.description: The URL to the template's documentation or README.

tags.description: An array of tags for categorizing and searching templates. Tags should be lowercase with hyphens.
